text:
Love is the strongest force and it indeed conquers all. While life often land you up in toughest of situations, its only love that can make the journey a little better. For Tahira Kashyap, who is facing life with a brave smile, the diagnosis of cancer came as a big shock. However, she chose to fight back and giving her company is her husband.
After being diagnosed with Stage 1A of breast cancer, Tahira has been fighting the battle bravely and she has been spreading a positive message- 'bald is beautiful.'
The couple was cleebrating a friend's birthday when the couple posed for a selfie that had #CoupleGoals written all over it.
Ayushmann captioned the picture as:
Instagram
"Posers and Lovers."
Just to give you an update on Tahira's cancer treatment, she recently posted a bald selfie after chopping off her hair amidst cancer treatment.
Don't Miss 122 SHARES 197 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES
She is embracing the uncertainty of life as a boss and that's what we absolutely love about her.
title: Amidst Her Cancer Treatment, Ayushmann Khurrana And Tahira Kashyap Prove Love Conquers All!
description: Love is the strongest force and it indeed conquers all. While life often land you up in toughest of situations, its only love that can make the journey a little better. For Tahira Kashyap, who is facing life with a brave smile, the diagnosis of cancer came as a big shock. However, she chose to fight back and giving her company is her husband.
